titleStmt.title: Whereas by some letters scattered about the streets of this city of Dublin, and by other informations, we have lately received notice of a conspiracy against the life of us the lord lieutenant ... by the Lord Lieutenant and Council, Ormonde.
titleStmt.author: Ireland. Lord Lieutenant (1677-1685 : Ormonde)
Ormonde, James Butler, Duke of, 1610-1688.

publicationStmt.publisher: Printed by Benjamin Took ... and are to be sold by Mary Crook ...,

notesStmt.note: Title from first 5 lines of text.
Statement of responsibility transposed from head of title.
"Given at the Council chamber in Dublin, the 13th. day of December, 1678."
Reproduction of original in the Society of Antiquaries Library, London.
